content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
How much of the "The Local Authority Housing Fund" has Leeds Council been awarded?
How much extra does the The Council have to provide in match funding?
Please provide:
The £ value
How many homes are planned to be built/purchased?
Yours faithfully,
P Wise

Dear P Wise,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Local Authority
Housing Fund which we received on 09/03/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
Before we can begin to process your FOI Request, we would like to clarify
what information you require.
Please confirm whether it is Sheffield City Council you want this
information for. If it is for Leeds, please contact
[1]
https://www.leeds.gov.uk/opendata/freedo...
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to a
request within 20 working days. The 20 working day clock will start the
day after we receive the necessary clarification.
You can provide your clarification by replying to this email. Please
note, if clarification is not received within 1 month your Freedom of
Information request will be closed.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [2][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: P Wise <[FOI #958376 email]>
Sent: 09 March 2023 19:43
To: FOI <[Sheffield City Council request email]>
Subject: Freedom of Information request - The Local Authority Housing Fund
Dear Sheffield City Council,
How much of the "The Local Authority Housing Fund" has Leeds Council been
awarded?
How much extra does the The Council have to provide in match funding?
Please provide:
The £ value
How many homes are planned to be built/purchased?
Yours faithfully,
P Wise
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Please use this email address for all replies to this request:
[3][FOI #958376 email]
Is [4][Sheffield City Council request email] the wrong address for Freedom of Information
requests to Sheffield City Council? If so, please contact us using this
form:
[5]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
Disclaimer: This message and any reply that you make will be published on
the internet. Our privacy and copyright policies:
[6]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
For more detailed guidance on safely disclosing information, read the
latest advice from the ICO:
[7]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
[8]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
Please note that in some cases publication of requests and responses will
be delayed.
If you find this service useful as an FOI officer, please ask your web
manager to link to us from your organisation's FOI page.
